notes.text: Security update for the Linux Kernel
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
The SUSE Linux Enterprise 12 SP1 kernel was updated to 3.12.74 to receive
the following security fix:

- CVE-2017-7533: Bug in inotify code allowed privilege escalation (bnc#1049483).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Race condition in the fsnotify implementation in the Linux kernel through 4.12.4 allows local users to gain privileges or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted application that leverages simultaneous execution of the inotify_handle_event and vfs_rename functions.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
